name: Flappy Bird PyGame

3/15/21: 

The Game Is Still In Development, We Will Update And Change The File By Wednesday To The Full Game. Once I Update And Upload The Final Game, I Will Make The Project Open Source, And Anyone May Contribute. You can Also Send Ideas In The Discussion Board.

The Download Will Make A Folder That That Location, And From That, You Can Open The File Called "Main", ( Not The Python File, The Other One)
